name: ParadiseLost AlchemistTerra2
description:
The sequel of the popular game "Terra's Summons".
Various new appearing items,
new item functions,
and fantastic animation effects
make the game more fabulous!!

Let's find many hidden secrets and new sub stories in Terra's world.

-------------------------

Terra's Summons 2
A man's memory.

He was a common guy (Tsuppari).
He had dreams, he had hobbies,
and he loved one beautiful woman.
And the space-time of Paradise Lost
made his life unique.
